title: IPTC Video Metadata Hub JSON Schema
description: Overall structure of video metadata of a single media asset - sets of metadata for the whole asset and fragments of the asset -- the properties comply with the IPTC Video Metadata Hub Recommendation 1.2 (IPTC/MS/2018-05-07)

circaDateCreated.title: Circa Date Created
circaDateCreated.description: Approximate date or range of dates associated with the creation and production of a video.

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: Date and optionally time when the video was created

dateModified.title: Date Modified
dateModified.description: Date and optionally time when the video was modified last time

dateReleased.title: Date Released
dateReleased.description: Date and optionally time of the public release of the video

episode.description: Episode in a specific season of a TV or video series this video is a member of.
episode.title: Episode

externalMetadataLinks.title: External Metadata URL
externalMetadataLinks.description: Link(s) to an external web resource for retrieval of further metadata about this video

feedIdentifier.title: Feed Identifier
feedIdentifier.description: Identifier of the feed/source this video was delivered by

identifier.title: Video Identifier
identifier.description: Globally unambiguous identifier of the video regardless of renditions, formats, encodings etc. This identifier should be shared across all renditions.

planningRefs.description: Reference to a data item used for planning the shooting of this video

publicationEvents.title: Publication Event
publicationEvents.description: Date and optionally the time of publishing this video with name and identifier for the event of this publication.

ratings.title: Rating
ratings.description: How the video is rated by a public source or an authority

registryEntries.title: Registry Entry
registryEntries.description: Identifier of the video issued by an identified registry.

releaseReady.title: Ready for Release
releaseReady.description: An indicator if this video is ready for being released to the public. This depends on rules by the party responsible for the publication.

rendition.title: Video Rendition
rendition.description: Unambiguous identifier of the video specific to a rendition.

season.description: Season of a TV or video series this video is a member of.
season.title: Season

series.description: TV or video series this video is a member of.
series.title: Series

storylineIdentifiers.title: Storyline Identifier
storylineIdentifiers.description: Identifier(s) of a story evolving over time with which this video is associated

stylePeriod.title: Style Period
stylePeriod.description: The style, historical or artistic period, movement, group, or school whose characteristics are represented by the video

temporalCoverage.description: Period of time covered by the video
temporalCoverage.title: Temporal Coverage

videoVersion.title: Video Version
videoVersion.description: Version of the video identified by the Video Identifier

workflowTag.description: Indicator for the role of this video in a production workflow.
workflowTag.title: Workflow Tag

aboutCvTerms.title: CV Term About the Content
aboutCvTerms.description: What the video is about expressed by term(s) selected from taxonomies or controlled vocabularies

dataOnScreen.title: Data Displayed on Screen
dataOnScreen.description: Text or other data shown in some region of the image.

description.description: Textual description of the content of the video
description.title: Description

dopesheetLinks.title: Dopesheet Link
dopesheetLinks.description: Link(s) to an external web resource providing a shotlist with descriptions

featuredOrganisations.title: Featured Organisation
featuredOrganisations.description: Organisation(s) featured by the content of the video

genres.title: Genre
genres.description: Artistic, style, journalistic, product or other genre(s) of the video.

headline.description: Short description of the content of the video
headline.title: Headline

keywords.title: Keyword
keywords.description: What the video is about expressed by a free choice of descriptive phrases or keywords

locationsCreated.title: Location Shot
locationsCreated.description: Place from where the video was shot, in particular where the camera was located

personsHeard.title: Person Heard
personsHeard.description: Person(s) who can be heard only in the video

productsShown.title: Product Shown
productsShown.description: Product(s) identified by a GTIN code shown by the video

title.description: Title of the video, should be a shorthand reference
title.title: Title

transcriptLinks.title: Transcript Link
transcriptLinks.description: Link(s) to an external web resource providing a transcription of the video

visualColour.title: Visual Colour
visualColour.description: The visual colouring of the video.

contributors.title: Contributor
contributors.description: Party or parties (person or organisation) which contributed to the video, refinement by the role attribute.

copyrightNotice.description: Any textual notice necessary by legal needs or common use to indicate the current owner of the copyright of this media resource
copyrightNotice.title: Copyright Notice

copyrightOwners.title: Rights Owner
copyrightOwners.description: Data identifying the individual or organisation owning the rights for this media resource which could be the video as a whole or a clip in a video. The optional role attribute may indicate which facet of rights is covered by this entity.

copyrightYear.title: Copyright Year
copyrightYear.description: Year appearing in the copyright notice as numeric value

creators.title: Creator
creators.description: Party or parties (person or organisation) which created the video, refinement by the role attribute.

creditLine.title: Credit Line
creditLine.description: Credit to person(s) and/or organisation(s) required by the supplier of the video (clip) to be used when published.

embdEncRightsExpr.title: Embedded Rights and Licensing Terms
embdEncRightsExpr.description: Structure covering the assertion of rights, the granting of licenses and both in human and a machine readable ways (including restrictions, embargoes, duties ...)

linkedEncRightsExpr.title: Linked Rights and Licensing Terms
linkedEncRightsExpr.description: Structure covering the assertion of rights, the granting of licenses and both in human and a machine readable ways (including restrictions, embargoes, duties ...)

licensor.description: Company or person to  be contacted for licensing
licensor.title: Licensor

modelReleaseDocuments.title: Model Release Document
modelReleaseDocuments.description: Identifier(s) of a Model Release document.

modelReleaseStatus.description: Summarises the availability and scope of model releases authorizing usage of the likenesses of persons appearing in the video
modelReleaseStatus.title: Model Release Status

propertyReleaseDocuments.title: Property Release Document
propertyReleaseDocuments.description: Identifier(s) of a Property Release document.

propertyReleaseStatus.description: Summarises the availability and scope of property releases authorising usage of the properties appearing in the photograph.
propertyReleaseStatus.title: Property Release Status

supplier.description: Supplier of this copy of the media resource
supplier.title: Supplier

supplyChainSources.title: Supply Chain Source
supplyChainSources.description: Person or party who has a role in the content supply chain.

audioBitRate.title: Audio Bitrate
audioBitRate.description: Bit rate of the audio data depending on the Video Bit Rate Type: if fixed the fixed rate, if variable the maximum rate. The unit is bits per second.

audioBitRateType.title: Audio Bitrate Type
audioBitRateType.description: Indicates if the bitrate of the audio data is fixed or variable

audioBitsPerSample.description: Number of bits used for an audio sample

audioCoding.description: Machine readable code and a human readable term for the used audio coding
audioCoding.title: Audio Coding

audioSampleRate.title: Audio Sample Rate
audioSampleRate.description: Rate used for sampling the audio

editorialDurationEnds.title: Editorial Duration End
editorialDurationEnds.description: The point in time and frames the content proposed for editorial use ends

editorialDurationStarts.title: Editorial Duration Start
editorialDurationStarts.description: The point in time and frames the content proposed for editorial use starts

editorialDurations.title: Editorial Duration
editorialDurations.description: Duration of the video content proposed for editorial use

fileBitrate.title: File Bitrate
fileBitrate.description: The total bit rate of the all media streams in this file.

fileDuration.description: Duration of the overall video (from the first to the last frame)
fileDuration.title: File Duration

fileFormat.description: Format of the file containing the video data.
fileFormat.title: File Format

frameSize.description: Size of the video frame in pixels
frameSize.title: Frame Size

mediaType.title: Media Type
mediaType.description: IANA Media Type of the video.

orientation.title: Orientation
orientation.description: Orientation of the visual content of the video as defined by TIFF.

signalAspectRatio.title: Signal Aspect Ratio
signalAspectRatio.description: Ratio of width and height in pixels of a frame

signalFormat.title: Signal Format
signalFormat.description: Combined term including the size of the frame, interlaced/progressive, framerate

streamReady.title: Stream-ready
streamReady.description: Indicates if this video can be used for streaming by the rule of having the key technical data of the video at the start rather than end of the file and that the wrapper and essense format are suitable for streaming

videoBitrate.title: Video Bitrate
videoBitrate.description: Bit rate of the video data depending on the Video Bit Rate Type: if fixed the fixed rate, if variable the maximum rate. The unit is bits per second.

videoBitrateType.title: Video Bitrate Type
videoBitrateType.description: Indicates if the bitrate of the video data is fixed or variable

videoCoding.description: Machine readable code and a human readable term for the used video coding
videoCoding.title: Video Coding

videoDisplayAspectRatio.title: Display Aspect Ratio
videoDisplayAspectRatio.description: Ratio of width and height of the displayed image. (Width and height do not require to be in pixels.)

videoEncodingProfile.title: Video Profile
videoEncodingProfile.description: Name of the used video profile as defined by the maker of the encoding standard.

videoStreamsCount.title: Video Streams Count
videoStreamsCount.description: Count of video streams in a video file.

^photoVideoMetadata_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+.description: Container for a set of metadata from a party other than IPTC
